content: AI is powerful, but YOU bring the creativity, judgment, and vision. Don’t forget that.
You don’t compete with AI — you collaborate with it.
Pair programming with AI doesn’t make you less capable. It makes you faster.
Your value isn’t typing — it's thinking.
AI helps you write code. Only you can decide what’s worth building.
Every great developer today uses AI. You're not behind — you're on track.
Even AI gets things wrong. So be kind to yourself when you do too.
Your curiosity is still your superpower.
A good prompt is not cheating — it's a skill.
The future isn’t AI replacing developers — it’s developers who use AI replacing those who don’t.
